name: Resident Evil: Revelations - Unveiled Edition (Limited Edition)
summary: Taste the horror, when Resident Evil is unveiled, every creature becomes more gruesome, you can feel the slime on their skin and see the gleam on their fangs. Besides turning every screen into HD, the developers added new scenarios and enemies into the campaign. The zombies aren't only horrifying to look at, they force gamers into a situations where they have to make impossible choices. To pace the action at an even more break-neck speed, the the developers powered up the Raid Mode. There are more weapons for gamers to wield, more custom parts to pick up. When the enemies become too difficult, the gamer can hook up to the network mode to ask other gamers for help.
